fr.cs.simergy.humanresources

Class Physician

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cs.simergy.simulation.Linkage
      • fr.cs.simergy.simulation.Link
        • fr.cs.simergy.humanresources.Physician

  • public class Physician
extends Link
    This class represents a physician who is in charge of overseeing patients throughout their staying in the ED. He visits a patient, takes exams' decisions and emits results.
